## Description

Brief description of changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] RFC / Proposal
- [ ] Data wrangling rule

## Testing

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests pass (`pytest`)
- [ ] Manual testing completed

## Documentation

- [ ] Updated relevant documentation
- [ ] Added example code if applicable
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`black`, `isort`, `mypy`)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] No PHI or sensitive data included
- [ ] No breaking changes (or migration guide provided)

## For RFC/Proposal PRs

- [ ] Proposal document in `proposals/` directory
- [ ] Follows RFC template from CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Implementation checklist included
